issue.title: [Python] Prevent segfault on accidental call of pyarrow.Array
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2492](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2492). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If you mistype `pyarrow.Array` instead of `pyarrow.array` you get a segmentation fault on some functions. We should also take care of these segmentation faults but also should prevent the user from calling the constructor again in this fashion.
